This directory contains vendored thirdâ€‘party assets used by the utilities pages.

Included libraries
- QRCode.js (qrcode.min.js)
  - Version: 1.0.0 (sourced from jsDelivr/npm)
  - Upstream: https://github.com/davidshimjs/qrcodejs

Notes
- Vendoring removes the runtime dependency on external CDNs for reliability and privacy.
- If you update the library, please also review and keep the upstream license file in sync.
